modName: Lanterns of Skyrim All In One - Patching for your mods
summary: This is a tutorial for adding Lanterns of Skyrim patches for your own mods like player home.
descriptionHtml:
Hello there.
I\'ve decided to write a tutorial for adding Lanterns of Skyrim patches for your own mods like player home. In the Download section there is a tutorial based on a little player home near Riverwood.

[img]http://s8.postimage.org/fdl08zcdx/900finale.jpg[/img]

Enjoy!

[img]http://s15.postimage.org/wmxw7omwb/900ingame.jpg[/img]
author: MannyGT
